titleStmt.title: The fox unkennel'd; or, The Whiggs idol. By a young nobleman of the University of Oxford.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Benson in the Strand,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "If men are deem'd for loyalty ..."
On the Dukes of Marlborough and Ormonde.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
